rules.natural: Provided that the smart fridge is an active device, the system is operational in a normal state.
If there is a recording show broadcast, then it is not the case that there is a live stream show broadcast.

rules.prover9_expression: (sensor_reading(soil_moisture, low) -> (-(moisture_level(herb_garden, adequate) -> plant_monitor(herb_garden, active)) -> irrigation_system(herb_garden, triggered)))
rules.natural: In the event that the soil moisture sensor reading is low, then if the herb garden's moisture level being adequate does not lead to the plant monitor being active, the herb garden's irrigation system is triggered.
The soil moisture sensor reading is either low or critical.

rules.prover9_expression: (sensor_reading(soil_moisture, critical) -> (-(moisture_level(herb_garden, adequate) -> plant_monitor(herb_garden, active)) -> irrigation_system(herb_garden, triggered)))
rules.natural: Given that the soil moisture sensor reading is critical, if the herb garden's moisture level being adequate does not imply the plant monitor is active, then the herb garden's irrigation system is triggered.
There is a power outage on the main grid or in the neighborhood.
Provided that there is a power outage in the neighborhood, if the system is not operational normally, then the generator backup power is activated.
If the home owner notification system is on alert, then whenever there is a power outage on the main grid and the system is not operational normally, the generator backup power is activated.
The system is operational in a normal state provided that the entertainment system is an active device.
If the manager notification system is on alert, then in the case of a power outage on the main grid and the system not being operational normally, the generator backup power is activated.
When the main hub is the automation controller, either the home owner notification system is on alert or the manager notification system is on alert.
The automation controller is either the main hub or the backup hub.
Under the condition that the backup hub is the automation controller, the home owner notification system is on alert or the manager notification system is on alert.
If a system conflict is detected, then a diagnostic check is running.
Provided that a system conflict is detected, it is not the case that a resolution protocol is initiated.
There is a system conflict detected, or manual override is active, or the system is operational normally.
Given that a diagnostic check is running, system recovery is in progress.
System recovery being in progress leads to a resolution protocol being initiated.
The smart fridge is an active device provided that it has a stable power supply.
Either the smart fridge has a stable power supply, or the entertainment system has a stable power supply.
When the national service is the weather monitor, and there is a severe storm weather alert, and the system is not operational normally, then an emergency protocol is activated.
If the local service is the weather monitor, then under the condition of a severe storm weather alert and the system not being operational normally, an emergency protocol is activated.
Provided that the alert status is active, a forecast update is issued, or the weather monitor is the national service, or the weather monitor is the local service.
A system-wide emergency broadcast implies that the alert status is active.
There is either a system-wide emergency broadcast or a local-only emergency broadcast.
If there is a local-only emergency broadcast, then the alert status is active.
The main controller being the device coordinator implies that the backup controller is the device coordinator.

Under the condition that the coordination protocol is primary, if the backup controller is the device coordinator, then the smart fridge is an active device or the entertainment system is an active device.
The coordination protocol is either primary or secondary.
If the coordination protocol is secondary, then given that the backup controller is the device coordinator, the smart fridge is an active device or the entertainment system is an active device.

Provided that a comprehensive network scan is performed, and the router is the network monitor, and neither the smart fridge nor the entertainment system is an active device, then the device network is not stable.
If a basic network scan is performed, and the router is the network monitor, and neither the smart fridge nor the entertainment system is an active device, then the device network is not stable.
A comprehensive network scan is performed given that the diagnostic tool is advanced.
The diagnostic tool is either advanced or basic.
A basic network scan is performed if the diagnostic tool is basic.
The smart fridge is in maintenance mode provided that a service technician is scheduled.
A service technician is either scheduled or on emergency call.
If a service technician is on emergency call, then the smart fridge's cooling function is not normal.
The smart fridge's temperature control is optimal whenever its cooling function is normal.
The smart fridge's food preservation is good if its temperature control is optimal.
If neither the smart fridge nor the entertainment system is an active device, then the device network is stable.
Given that the herb garden's moisture level being adequate does not imply the plant monitor is active, the herb garden's irrigation system is not triggered.
Whenever the entertainment system having a stable power supply does not result in it being an active device, the smart fridge's cooling function is normal.
Provided that a weekly cooking show event being scheduled does not imply the system is operational normally, there is a live stream show broadcast.
Whenever it is not true that a weekly cooking show event not resulting in system operational normality leads to a recording show broadcast, the herb garden's moisture level is adequate.
Provided that it is not the case that a weekly cooking show event not implying system operational normality results in a recording show broadcast, the herb garden's plant monitor is not active.
If the system is not operational normally, then an emergency protocol is not activated.
